column2: "Ah, <%me>. You aren't with Zeno, are you? Good."
"Don't tell him, but I'm here training on my own."
"He thinks of me as a burden, so I want to be able to help him more."
"But I know that I'm not suited for any kind of fighting."
"It's not as much about photon ability as it is about motivation. I usually don't care about getting stronger."
"I just want to be by his side. That's enough for me."
"Sorry, I can't let myself think these kinds of naive thoughts."
"I need to get back to training."
